#id=1
#text=Upon entering my local hair salon , I was greeted by a stylist .
#id=2
#text=She took my name and told me that I would be next to receive a haircut , because no other customers were in line before me .
#id=3
#text=I waited in a chair for several minutes , then she called my name and led me to the chair in which I would get my hair cut .
#id=4
#text=The stylist introduced herself and asked how I would like my hair cut .
#id=5
#text=I described how I would like my hair cut and she showed that she understood .
#id=6
#text=Then , the stylist covered me with a cape to keep hair from getting on my clothes .
#id=7
#text=She then sprayed my hair with water to wet it and quickly combed my hair , preparing it to be cut .
#id=8
#text=Now we were ready to cut my hair .
#id=9
#text=With scissors , she cut my hair in sections , starting at the front and working toward the back .
#text=She used her skills to cut my hair to match what I described to her earlier .
#text=Once she was finished , she used electric clippers to shave my neckline and shape the back of my hair .
#text=Once the haircut was complete , she used a blow drier to remove the cut hair and then removed the cape .
#text=Finally , she led me to the cash register , where I paid her for her services and thanked her for her time .
#text=I then exited the shop with a fresh haircut .
